name: NB107A
description:
Play in browser or available as download on PC, Mac, Linux.

Micheal's life isn't easy. 

His father is a famous spy who was poisoned on his last mission by NB107A, an unknown chemical with no known cure. In a desperate attempt to alleviate his father's pain, Micheal joins Atlin Missionary University's Chemical Analysis program to find the cure himself. 

Now his graduate adviser wants to have a serious talk and he knows that he's about to be sacked. 

His last chance rests with a mysterious man who looks almost exactly like Micheal himself and who seems to know a little too much about NB107A...

Will Micheal find the cure for his father's illness? Why does this mysterious man look exactly like Micheal? Will Micheal's life ever get easier?!

Play and find out!

Credits:

  • Writing, Art and Programming - Heiden
  • Music - Mike Morton mortonsoundworks.com | Soundcloud: mortonsoundworks | Twitter: @MortonSoundWrx
  • Assorted SFX -  
  • Beta Readers - Ashe Thurman, Steamgirl
  • Select textures by Freepik.com

Hello everyone! This is my first big Unity release! It's a point and click adventure game with two different endings! I meant to make it within a week, but it ended up taking almost up to a year to complete it all. (Wow, talk about underestimating the amount of work goes into making a Unity game, haha!) 

You can play this game in your browser, no download required! Or if you prefer your games offline, you can download a desktop version as well. For the desktop version, click download and then unzip the folder. Open the folder and click on "Secret spy game that is also an angel game.exe", that should start it up!

I hope you enjoy! Let me know what you thought of the characters, and who you liked the most. :D
